assessments/gazebo-robot-project.description: Design, build, and simulate a custom mobile robot in Gazebo with sensors and navigation capabilities

intro.title: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics - Complete Course

learning-paths/complete-physical-ai.title: Complete Physical AI Course
learning-paths/complete-physical-ai.description: Comprehensive 13-week program covering all aspects of physical AI and humanoid robotics. Ideal for students seeking complete mastery of the field.

learning-paths/learning-paths.title: Learning Paths
learning-paths/learning-paths.description: Choose your learning journey through Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

learning-paths/quick-start.title: Quick Start Path
learning-paths/quick-start.description: Essential chapters only for rapid deployment. Perfect for teams needing to get started quickly with core concepts.

learning-paths/robotics-foundations.title: Robotics Foundations
learning-paths/robotics-foundations.description: First 5 weeks focusing on fundamentals. Ideal for beginners building strong foundational knowledge.

learning-paths/simulation-specialist.title: Simulation Specialist
learning-paths/simulation-specialist.description: Focused track on robot simulation, digital twins, and virtual testing environments. Perfect for simulation engineers and digital twin developers.

learning-paths/software-developer.title: Software Developer Track
learning-paths/software-developer.description: Focus on software development aspects: ROS 2 programming and VLA integration. Ideal for software engineers entering robotics.

module-1/ch1-1.title: ROS 2 Architecture & Concepts
module-1/ch1-1.description: Introduction to ROS 2 framework, its architecture, and core concepts for robotic development

module-1/ch1-2.title: Nodes, Topics, Services & Actions
module-1/ch1-2.description: Deep dive into ROS 2 communication patterns including publish/subscribe, request/response, and goal-based interactions

module-1/ch1-3.title: URDF & Robot Description Formats
module-1/ch1-3.description: Learn to create robot models using Unified Robot Description Format and visual representations

module-1/ch1-4.title: Python rclpy Programming
module-1/ch1-4.description: Develop complete ROS 2 applications using Python client library rclpy

module-1/index.title: The Robotic Nervous System (ROS 2)
module-1/index.description: Master the Robot Operating System 2 framework for building distributed robotic applications

module-2/ch2-1.title: Gazebo Simulation Environment
module-2/ch2-1.description: Set up and configure Gazebo for robotic simulation with ROS 2 integration

module-2/ch2-2.title: Physics Simulation & Collisions
module-2/ch2-2.description: Master physics engines, collision detection, and realistic material properties

module-2/ch2-3.title: Sensor Simulation (LiDAR, Cameras, IMUs)
module-2/ch2-3.description: Simulate various robot sensors including LiDAR, cameras, and inertial measurement units

module-2/ch2-4.title: Environment and Scene Building
module-2/ch2-4.description: Create complex simulation environments and scenes for testing humanoid robots

module-2/index.title: The Digital Twin (Gazebo & Unity)
module-2/index.description: Create realistic robot simulations using Gazebo and Unity for testing and development

module-3/ch3-1.title: NVIDIA Isaac Sim Platform
module-3/ch3-1.description: Introduction to NVIDIA Isaac Sim for photorealistic robot simulation and AI development

module-3/ch3-2.title: Visual SLAM & Perception Pipelines
module-3/ch3-2.description: Implement simultaneous localization and mapping using visual sensors and deep learning

module-3/ch3-3.title: Path Planning with Nav2
module-3/ch3-3.description: Advanced navigation systems using ROS 2 Navigation 2 framework for autonomous movement

module-3/ch3-4.title: Sim-to-Real Transfer Techniques
module-3/ch3-4.description: Bridge the gap between simulation and real-world robot deployment

module-3/index.title: The AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac)
module-3/index.description: Implement AI-powered robotics using NVIDIA Isaac Sim platform for advanced perception and control

module-4/ch4-1.title: Voice-to-Action Systems (Whisper)
module-4/ch4-1.description: Implement speech recognition and command interpretation using OpenAI Whisper

module-4/ch4-2.title: LLM-based Cognitive Planning
module-4/ch4-2.description: Utilize Large Language Models for robot task planning and decision making

module-4/ch4-3.title: Multi-modal Interaction Design
module-4/ch4-3.description: Create systems that integrate vision, language, and action for natural robot interaction

module-4/ch4-4.title: Capstone Project - Autonomous Humanoid
module-4/ch4-4.description: Complete integration project building an autonomous humanoid robot with full VLA capabilities

module-4/index.description: Integrate vision, language, and action systems for intelligent humanoid robot interaction
